text_block_list.text:
With a seventh victory added to her flawless record, all eyes are on 
Mihono Bourbon, if they weren't already.

As far as the media's concerned, she's practically already won the 
Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Admirer A
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon! Please, shake my hand!

text_block_list.name: Admirer B
text_block_list.text: I'd give anything for your autograph!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Same here! I'll take a big ol' ketchup signature on this omelet 
rice—and make it cutesy!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Very well. I'm not sure I understand the last part of your request, but 
I'll do my best.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Cutesy… cutesy…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ooh, that's it! Give it some steez!
Ding dong

text_block_list.name: School Announcement
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon, the student council president would like to see you. 
Please report to her office.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: President Rudolf?
Knock, knock

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Come in.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. You called, President Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. We've had a veritable flood of interview requests for you. I was 
hoping you'd acquiesce.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's no wonder, what with the undefeated Triple Crown right before 
your eyes. Expectations are high.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But those expectations… Do you not feel undue pressure from them?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: No. Even if I did feel pressure, I would simply convert it to strength.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Good. Spoken like one who is prepared for greatness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown requires much mental fortitude to wear. I would see 
you run as your usual self.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
…However, I am cognizant of the fact that achieving the Triple Crown 
will be no easy task.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower… With each victory over her, I seem to only grow more 
aware of this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see. You mean to say she is your… Ah, but what use is it putting it 
into words?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My position does not allow me to play favorites, but I do hope to see 
a satisfying end to this year's Classics.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I'll keep that in mind.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: …That aside, President. There's something I want to ask you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If I can be of help, I shall gladly answer.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: When giving an autograph, how might one make it more "cutesy"?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …I'm afraid that goes beyond my area of expertise.
In my office, before practice.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Check it out! Guess who got Bourbon's autograph?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: On omelette rice, of all things?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …The letters are cute.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
This is for you, Rice! I know you pack a bigger appetite than you let 
on! Dig in!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?! You're not supposed to tell people that!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Is it just me, or is everybody talking about Bourbon?

Given her undefeated record, it's only natural. You can't help but 
wonder just how far she'll go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
We've nothing to fear. Rice's abilities rival hers, and that speaks for 
itself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The shrinking gap between them with each race is proof of that.

Though Rice lost to Bourbon yet again in her most recent race, it was 
closer than in the Derby.
Plus, her ambition is now fully focused on winning against her rival.
choice_data_list: The Kikuka Sho is all yours!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? Look at you, oozing with confidence!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's because training so much with you all has made me into a stronger 
runner.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I just can't wait to run against her again. It's all I can think about.

She's learned to feel excited about races instead of anxious. That's 
how you know she's grown.

Seeing real progress in her repeated runs against Bourbon must have 
given her confidence.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right! Let's kick off today's training! First up, three laps around the 
island of Shikoku!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's easily over 3,000 kilometers!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'll do my best.

Even as expectations for her rival pile high, Rice Shower's fighting 
spirit burns all the brighter.
